summary: A radio journalist and his technician get in over their heads when they hatch a scheme to fake their own kidnapping during a rebel uprising in South America and hide out in New York instead.
cast: Ricky Gervais|Eric Bana|Vera Farmiga|Kelly Macdonald|Kevin Pollak|America Ferrera|Raúl Castillo|Benjamin Bratt|Kim Ramirez|Jim Norton|Bob Banks|Jonathan Langdon|Glen Grant|Duane Murray|Ryan F. Hughes|Adrian Rebucas|Kelly McCormack|Ari Cohen|Meghan Heffern|Mimi Kuzyk|Bill Lake|Anne Mroczkowski|Laara Sadiq|Clyde Whitham|Michael Kash|Dan Duran|Michael Anthony|Ruth Devorah|Steve Greenstein|Scott Anderson|Daniel Della Penna|Val Cole|Alison Brooks|Stephen Lee Wright|Pedro Miguel Arce|Manuel Rodriguez-Saenz|Walter Alza|Rachael Ancheril|Pedro Salvín|Daveed Louza|Milan Carmona|Juan Castano|Sonetta Duncan|Hiro Honda|Margo Kazaryan|Christopher Meneses|Emilie Paquet|Asad Que|Dave Reachill|Frankie Verroca|Mran Volkhard|Scott C Wilson
title: Special Correspondents
